Text:

CF with Chi is in - but the show after Craig's mother has died. It is definitely the point where I started to love that Scottish Conan guy. There are shows aired night before Obama won, show with Desmond Tutu for which Craig got Peabody award... with his favored guests and these are all hand-picked shows for many (to greater extent my own) personal reasons.

In short, it is really essential pack for Craig's fans, shows have been maximally compressed in [lepton] format . and every single one has fat reason to be included.

Regarding the rest of your asking, I have only JLeno with Conan, but berried somewhere for god-knows-what-reason. 

Rest of the old shows I have not. Sorry. I keep all CF shows maybe three months, keep the good ones and unfortunately, delete the others. It's 20+ shows every month and volume is too big to keep.

When one seeds 15 GIGABYTES over ONE night and statistics shows 32 finished downloads - but in the morning you have found FOUR seeders besides yourself - anything else but be mad at people who do Hit&Runs - is simply - stupid and ultimately masochistic.

I do not support Hit&Runs. Never did - my reaction have always been the same, last few years.

People who followed me from mininova knows that...

Even public library demand returning the books, right?
And no one, not a single soul, cannot take something and give back - NOTHING. 
Also, robbing the pirate - makes one even bigger criminal than the original sinner ever was...

...and going into nearest church, musk or synagogue and asking the god for forgiveness - after one has hit other man with a car and ran away - counts shit. To anybody even remotely sane.

Idiots.
